title: Shrimp Fried Rice
description: A savory fried rice dish made with plump shrimp, vegetables, and eggs.

title: Rakhine-style Fish Curry
description: A spicy and tangy fish curry from the Rakhine state of Myanmar/Burma, made with turmeric, shrimp paste, and tamarind.

title: Grilled Squid
description: Fresh squid grilled to perfection with garlic, lime, and herbs.

title: Seafood Noodle Soup
description: A comforting noodle soup loaded with shrimp, fish, squid, and vegetables.
